rComments: Besides being a grammer nazi she is nice lady. She is probably one of the better porter core teachers. She is very understanding of her students different needs and will try to work with you as much as she can. A bit of a harsh grader though.

Man, Ellen is a fox. I would totally go for her, except she's way out of my league. She is very helpful and swears alot which is hilarious. She wrote for playmate in the past (1970s) so she knows her way around... things. Definitely take her. Oh, and private extra credit opportunities are always her thing ;)
Probably the best Porter core teacher there is. She is very helpful and her assignments are a lot better then most of other teachers. She is one of those awesome old ladies.
Ellen is awesome! Class is not hard, just do work on time, and spend time on it. Read the books, and pay attention to her comments. She helped me realize how crappy my writing was.

I found her class to be really helpful. She really showed me how I can improve my writing and I feel more confident in my writing skills than before. The class is not really hard, just make sure you actually spend time on your essays. Do NOT wait until the last minute, because she will know. If you pay attention to her critiques, you will do well.

Ellen Hawkes knows her stuff. She will tear your essays up and change your view on the way you write essays. The advice i got in this class has helped me in every essay thus far. The class is challenging but as long as you put in effort she will notice. Plus the books are actually interesting!

Ellen was a good teacher however this class is completely useless...im sorry to all those who have to take this. it is a complete waste of time, paper, and reading. however ANgels in America was a good read.

Ellen was my first experience at UCSC. I must say she put me on the right track. She is a tough cookie to please- but it should be expected that you do the reading and put effort into writing. Her feedback was alway extensive. Expect A LOT of reading and writing and discussion of controversial topics.

Excellent professor ! Her comments on your writing will help you greatly if you listen. She was very fair in her grading, just be sure to turn in assignments and attend class promptly and you'll do great!

she will challenge you and greatly improve your writing confidence. Just read the books and write the essays. If you don't b.s. them then you will do fine. she is a journalist and can tell if you are writing crap.
